planCardDescription: Below are the details of your current plan. You can change your plan or cancel your subscription at any time.
billingPortalCardDescription: Visit your Billing Portal to manage your subscription and billing. You can upgrade or cancel your plan, or download your invoices.
cancelAtPeriodEndDescription: Your subscription is scheduled to be canceled on {{- endDate }}.
renewAtPeriodEndDescription: Your subscription is scheduled to renew on {{- endDate }}
noPermissionsAlertHeading: You do not have permission to change billing settings
noPermissionsAlertBody: Please contact your organization's owner to change billing settings.
checkoutSuccessTitle: All Set! Everything is in order.
checkoutSuccessDescription: Thank you for subscribing, we've successfully processed your subscription! A confirmation email will be sent to {{ customerEmail }}.
cannotManageBillingAlertDescription: You do not have permissions to manage billing. Please contact your organization's owner.
manageTeamPlanDescription: Choose a plan that fits your team's needs. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time.
noPaymentMethodsDescription: Please contact your organization's owner to add a payment method.
invalidCheckoutUrlDescription: There was an error processing your checkout URL. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
includedUpTo: Up to {{upTo}} {{unit}} included in the plan
planPickerAlertErrorDescription: There was an error requesting payment. Please try again later.
cancelSubscriptionDate: Your subscription will be canceled at the end of the period

free.heading: You are currently on the Free Plan
free.description: You are on a free plan. You can upgrade to a paid plan at any time.

active.heading: Your subscription is active
active.description: Your subscription is active. You can manage your subscription and billing in the Customer Portal.

trialing.heading: You are on a trial
trialing.description: Your trial will end on {{- trialEndDate }}.

past_due.heading: Your payment is past due
past_due.description: Your payment is past due. Please update your payment method.

canceled.heading: Your subscription has been cancelled
canceled.description: Your subscription has been cancelled. You can reactivate it at any time.

unpaid.heading: Your subscription has not been paid
unpaid.description: Your subscription has not been paid. Please update your payment method.

incomplete.heading: Your payment is processing
incomplete.description: We are waiting for your payment to be processed. Please be patient.

incomplete_expired.heading: Your payment has expired
incomplete_expired.description: Your payment has expired. Please update your payment method.

paused.heading: Your subscription is paused
paused.description: Your subscription is paused. You can resume it at any time.

succeeded.heading: Your payment was successful
succeeded.description: Your payment was successful. Thank you for subscribing!

pending.heading: Your payment is pending
pending.description: Your payment is pending. Please be patient.

failed.heading: Your payment has failed
failed.description: Your payment has failed. Please update your payment method.

starter.name: Starter Plan
starter.description: Ideal for starting your digital services business.

premium.name: Premium Plan
premium.description: For agencies and creative studios with great potential.

advanced.name: Advanced Plan
advanced.description: For established teams with advanced needs.
